players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Bob: "Charlie's death is unfortunate, but we mustn't jump to conclusions just yet."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of Charlie? That seems odd for night 1."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of Charlie? That seems odd for night 1."
You: "I investigated Bob because I suspected him. Diana, are you trying to protect the mafia? We have a confirmed mafioso here."
Bob: "I'm innocent, and I will cooperate fully with the investigation. Diana, please explain your actions."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
